## Vector4.toArray() method

Populates the given array from the given index with the Vector4 coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toArray(array: FloatArray, index?: number): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | array to populate |
|  index | <code>number</code> | index of the array to start at (default: 0) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the Vector4.
